name: spotty-features
description: Playing around with Spotify's audio features API endpoints.
author: Sarah Vessels <cheshire137@gmail.com>

scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/browserify src/index.jsx -o src/public/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.watch: node_modules/.bin/watchify src/index.jsx -o src/public/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -v
